metadata.Title: CVE-2022-24301 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.Description:
In Minetest before 5.4.0, players can add or subtract items from adifferent player's inventory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-24301` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

minetest - 5.4.1+repack-2build1
minetest-data - 5.4.1+repack-2build1
minetest-server - 5.4.1+repack-2build1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: minetest package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.1+repack-2build1').
